Constructor Detail

UIControl

public UIControl(SearchHandlerInterface searchHandlerRef,
                 RecordHandlerInterface recHandlerRef,
                 CategoryHandlerInterface inCatHandlerRef,
                 CategoryHandlerInterface exCatHandlerRef,
                 PaymentMethodHandlerInterface payHandlerRef,
                 TargetManager targetMgrRef,
                 ReportGenerator rptGenRef,
                 SummaryGenerator sumGenRef)
To create a UI Manager.

Parameters:
searchHandlerRef - the reference to the search handling logic component
recHandlerRef - the reference to the record handling logic component
inCatHandlerRef - the reference to the income category handling logic component
exCatHandlerRef - the reference to the expense category handling logic component
payHandlerRef - the reference to the payment method handling logic component
targetMgrRef - the reference to the target management logic component
rptGenRef - the reference to the report generator logic component
sumGenRef - the reference to the summary generator logic component

public void showRecWin(int recordType)
Displays a new record handler window with the chosen tab

Parameters:
recordType - the type of new record Expense/Income
